
{{alias}}( k )
    Returns the standard deviation of a chi distribution.

    If provided `NaN` as any argument, the function returns `NaN`.

    If provided `k < 0`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    k: number
        Degrees of freedom.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Standard deviation.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 11.0 )
    ~0.699
    > v = {{alias}}( 1.5 )
    ~0.637

    See Also
    --------
